TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Padding extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示与用户界面 (UI) 元素关联的空白或边距信息。

span.span: Represents padding or margin information associated with a user interface (UI) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构表示的空白或边距与矩形的 UI 元素，如控件相关联。The structure represents the padding or margin associated with a rectangular UI element such as a control. 填充状态是 UI 元素的正文和其边缘之间的内部空间。The padding is the internal space between the body of the UI element and its edge. 与此相反，边距是分隔相邻的两个相邻的 UI 元素边缘的距离。In contrast, a margin is the distance separating the adjoining edges of two adjacent UI elements. 由于结构化的相似之处，用于表示填充和边距。Because of structural similarities, is used to represent both padding and margins. 对于关系图演示和属性上一个控件，请参阅[Margin 和 Windows 窗体控件中填充](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/margin-and-padding-in-windows-forms-controls.md)。For a diagram that illustrates the and properties on a control, see [Margin and Padding in Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/margin-and-padding-in-windows-forms-controls.md). 填充有不同的影响比上的控件的容器的控件。Padding has a different effect on controls that are containers than on controls that are not. 例如，在控件，属性定义的边框之间的间距及其子控件。For example, in a control, the property defines the spacing between the border of the and its child controls. 有关控件，属性定义的边框之间的间距控制和其包含的文本。For a control, the property defines the spacing between the border of the control and its contained text. 典型的方法和属性，除了还定义了以下类型级别成员：In addition to typical methods and properties, also defines the following type-level members: - 字段，它表示一个预定义且没有填充。The field, which represents a predefined with no padding. - 一组用于执行常见的算术运算的类，如添加两个运算符对象相加在一起。A set of operators for performing common arithmetic operations for the class, such as adding two objects together. 对于不支持运算符重载的语言，可以使用另一种方法语法调用这些成员。For languages that do not support operator overloading, you can invoke these members by using alternative method syntax. - ， ，和提供的方便在自定义布局计算中使用的组合的值的属性。The , , and properties, which provide combined values that are convenient for use in custom layout calculations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 Padding 属性创建四周的轮廓控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the Padding property to create an outline around a control. 完整代码列表，请参阅[如何： 创建边框围绕 Windows 窗体控件使用填充](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-border-around-a-windows-forms-control-using-padding.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Create a Border Around a Windows Forms Control Using Padding](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-border-around-a-windows-forms-control-using-padding.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Padding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Padding/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Padding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Padding/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置所有边缘的空白值。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding value for all the edges.

value.span: 如果所有边缘的空白相同，则为其空白值（以像素为单位）；否则为 -1。

span.span: The padding, in pixels, for all edges if the same; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在检索时此属性，如果所有边缘都使用的同一空白值，则返回该公共值。When retrieving this property, if all the edges use the same padding value, then this common value is returned. 否则，则返回-1 以指示填充的所有值都不相等。Otherwise, -1 is returned to indicate that all the padding values are not equal. 设置此值将改变， ， ，和属性。Setting this value changes the , , , and properties.

summary.span: 生成当前 的哈希代码。

span.span: Generates a hash code for the current .

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用， ， ，并值来生成表示当前的 32 位哈希代码。The method uses the , , , and values to generate a 32-bit hash code that represents the current . 哈希代码是对应于对象的值 （因此，两个具有相同的值的对象应生成相同的哈希代码） 的数字。A hash code is a number that corresponds to the value of an object (so two objects that have the same value should generate the same hash code). 使用哈希代码进行排序和存储对象的集合。Hash codes are used to sort and store collections of objects. 例如，表示的组织基于键的哈希代码的键 / 值对的集合。For example, a represents a collection of key-and-value pairs that are organized based on the hash code of the key. 哈希代码和哈希函数的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information on hash codes and hash functions, see the method.
